change-display-name.header: Change the name that this screen shows

HOME.no-history: You haven't scanned any products yet. Search for a barcode and scan it by pressing the button below

INTRO.sl1Descr: With us you will be able to scan more than 1.5 million products thanks to an open database managed by everyone. You will be able to establish allergen alerts, consult additives and alternatives to a product, create shopping lists, view the nutrients of a product and much more. Join!
INTRO.sl2Title: Select if you have any allergies
INTRO.sl2Descr: This way we can notify you when you scan or consult a product that may not suit you
INTRO.sl3Descr: Tell us if you want us to notify you if we find a product that is not suitable for vegetarians or vegans.
INTRO.finished.description: You are now ready to start using SnackScan. You can start scanning products without registering, however, to access all the features you will need to log in. You can log in anytime later

LOGIN.mandatory: Login is required to go to this page
LOGIN.password-validator: * Mínimo 8 carácteres y al menos un número

REGISTER.terms1: I've read and I accept the

RESET-PASSWORD.description: Enter your email below and we will send you instructions to recover your password

VERIFY-EMAIL.title: Check your inbox
VERIFY-EMAIL.description: We have sent a verification email to your email with a link. Click on that link and log in again. Check the Spam folder if you can't find the message.

AUTH-ERRORS.conditions: You have to accept the terms and conditions to continue
AUTH-ERRORS.sort-password: The password should have at least 6 characters
AUTH-ERRORS.input-incomplete: Please, complete all the fields in the form
AUTH-ERRORS.not-verified: Account is not verified. Please, check your inbox

GO-PREMIUM.title: Go Premium
GO-PREMIUM.description: See the advantages of all our premium plans. Choose one and cancel whenever you want.
GO-PREMIUM.add: Not premium yet? Click here and discover all the advantages of being a SnackScan Premium member
GO-PREMIUM.return-to-free: To return to the free plan cancel the subscriptions you currently have active
GO-PREMIUM.current-plan: This is your current plan. You can cancel without obligation at any time
GO-PREMIUM.current-free-plan: You are here on the basic plan right now

PRODUCT-DATA.title: Product details
PRODUCT-DATA.not-complete-warning: This product is not complete and therefore your information is less reliable. Help to complete this product by clicking on this message
PRODUCT-DATA.diet-warning: This product does not fit with your diet
PRODUCT-DATA.palm-oil-unknown: Unknown if it has palm oil
PRODUCT-DATA.possible-allergens: Allergies that this product can cause
PRODUCT-DATA.no-allergens: No ingredients that can cause allergy have been identified
PRODUCT-DATA.additive-free: Good! It seems that this product is free of additives

footer.go-to-product-page: Go to the product or manufacturer webpage
footer.disclaimer: This section is completely impartial. No brand has paid to have a better rating here.

types.colour-description: Provides a different color than the product would have naturally
types.preservative-description: Stops or minimizes the deterioration caused by the presence of different types of microorganisms (bacteria, yeasts and molds)
types.antioxidant-description: Decreases the oxidation reaction that occurs normally in food
types.stabilizer-description: Helps to change the texture of a product or to control a certain chemical reaction that may occur during its processing
types.antibiotic-description: Chemical substance produced by a living being or synthetic derivative, which kills or prevents the growth of certain classes of sensitive microorganisms
types.sweetener-description: They give a sweet taste, being used mainly as substitutes for sugar

CATEGORY-DETAILS.title: Category
CATEGORY-DETAILS.go-to-open-food-facts: See more details of this category in Open Food Facts

SETTINGS.title: Settings
SETTINGS.copy-incorrect: Unable to copy the user ID
SETTINGS.delete-cache-message1: This action is only convenient if you have edited a product in Open Food Facts. Deleting the cache will recalculate the evaluation of the product when you enter it.
SETTINGS.delete-cache-correctly: Cache deleted correctly. Restart the app
SETTINGS.logout.description: You will still keep your data on your device, but you will lose the ability to back up to the cloud
SETTINGS.delete-account-message1: Are you sure you want to continue? All your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered
SETTINGS.delete-account-message2: By deleting an account you will delete all your stored personal data. Your inventories, products and shopping lists will be deleted and cannot be recovered. Do you agree?
SETTINGS.delete-account-toast: Account successfully deleted. Please restart the app

LICENSES.title: Licenses
LICENSES.text1: The icons of this app have been extracted from
LICENSES.text2: We should mention the following authors:

SHOPPING-LISTS.title: My shopping lists
SHOPPING-LISTS.no-lists: You don't have a shopping list yet. Create one simply by entering an identifying name in the bottom bar

edit.title: Edit List
edit.name: List name
edit.delete.msg: This action is irreversible. All users with access to this list will also lose access to it

share.title: Share list
share.message: Enter the ID of the user with whom you want to share this list, in order to share this list and all its products.

list-details.delete-checked: Are you sure you want to delete the checked products?
list-details.no-products: The shopping list is currently empty. Add some items by writing them at the bottom

COMPARE-PRODUCTS.title: Product comparator
COMPARE-PRODUCTS.select-products: Select two products to go to the comparation
COMPARE-PRODUCTS.no-latest-products: Products you have recently viewed or scanned will appear here

SAVED-PRODUCTS.title: My saved products
SAVED-PRODUCTS.no-products: You don't have any saved products yet. You will be able to save a product by clicking on the button in the upper right corner within the details tab of that product

STATISTICS.title: Usage Statistics
STATISTICS.description: See how you've used SnackScan over time

MANUAL-SCAN.title: Manual Scan
MANUAL-SCAN.description: Broken or poor quality camera? Low light? Don't worry, you can manually search for any product by entering its barcode

EDIT-USER-WARNINGS.title: Notifications and Preferences
EDIT-USER-WARNINGS.description: Edit your allergies and food preferences, so we can give you warnings when a product is not suitable for you
